pageTitle: Itinerary for Wednesday, December 21, 2016 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Wednesday, December 21, 2016:

Calgary, Alberta

7:50 a.m. The Prime Minister will deliver a speech at the Calgary Chamber of Commerce and will participate in a moderated Q&A.

BMO Centre
Hall D
20 Roundup Way SW
Calgary, Alberta

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage for remarks and Q&A
  • Media should arrive no later than 7:00 a.m. and present themselves to room 100B
  • Media interested in covering the event should contact Kaitlyn Mason at: media@calgarychamber.com / 403-815-2750
  • Please note that the media riser is 100 ft from the stage. A cut away riser is available.


9:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the Mayor of Calgary, Naheed Nenshi.

BMO Center
Palomino Room B
20 Roundup Way SW
Calgary, Alberta

Notes for media:

  • Media should arrive no later than 9:00 a.m.
  • Photo opportunity only


10:45 a.m. The Prime Minister will visit the MacPhail School of Energy at the Southern Alberta Institute of Technology (SAIT) Polytechnic.

McPhail School of Energy
SAIT Polytechnique
1301 16th Avenue NW
Calgary, Alberta

Notes for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity for visit of Instrumentation Lab
  • Pooled photo opportunity for visit of Flow Lab (protective eyewear will be provided)
  • Media should arrive no later than 10:30 a.m. and present themselves to the Johnson-Cobbe Energy Centre (2nd floor)


12:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will hold a media availability.

McPhail School of Energy
SAIT Polytechnique
Johnson-Cobbe Energy Centre (2nd Floor)
1301 16th Avenue NW
Calgary, Alberta

Note for media:

  • Open coverage


Note: All times are local
